caption.p: Relative gene expression of CYP4Q4 gene in S. oryzae adults after 1 and 2 h treated with 6 mg/cm 2 of O. basilicum, N. sativa and L. angustifolia EOs (mean Â± SD) compared with standard chemical insecticide (10 ppm malathion). Different letters indicate significant differences between different treatments at p < 0.05.
